titleStmt.title: The emblem of our King. And of the Scots and English Parliaments : a poem. / By a well wisher to King, and Parliaments.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

The proemium, or introduction -- Scotlands first address to the King -- Scotland's or Affrica Companys second address to the King -- Scotland's, or African-Company's third and last address to his Majesty, presented by the Lord Ross, and others -- A dialogue, betwixt King, House of Peers, the Parliament, and House of Commons -- The authors wish or desiderium.
